summary: Ever feel like dropping a few hundred pounds of lead on your enemies?
descriptionHtml:
[center]
Why has no one done this before?
[youtube]N3Sas6FA0-A[/youtube]

Discworld trailers, I really don't know why but this spell will be there rofl
[youtube]FEBNe8XINd0[/youtube]

[youtube]aPzA_6RBWcg[/youtube][/center]

Mod adds a spell tome in the Solitude Blacksmith's house
It drops a damn anvil on ppls heads
Requires 20 Iron Ingots
Also it drops a fricking anvil on peoples fricking heads
Should only be used in large space
Did I mention IT DROPS A &*#%# ANVIL ON THEIR *&#*%# HEADS DOWNLOAD THIS THING

Oh the anvil can be used like a workbench
And the Meep Meep is actually in the spell when the anvil drops
Your welcome internet, I win
author: darren83
